attributes.action: enforce heavy fines on those found littering the environment!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country is becoming an open refuse dump, especially roadside verges. Councils don't appear to have the resources to collect the Rubbish.

The practice of dumping rubbish in public places whether sweet wrappers or empty cans and bottles should not be tollerated!

Hence fines should be heavy and enforced to discourage littering.
